The Egyptian magicians who are initially able to ______ some of the plagues that are brought on by God--they are quickly bested, and Yahweh's defeat of the magicians is tantamount to the defeat of the gods of Egypt.
result.chn: 埃及的巫师最初只会模仿,上帝制造的瘟疫，巫师们随后就被打败了，耶和华战胜了巫师相当于,打败了埃及的众神。(旧约导论课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: In announcing the program, Mr.Zuma said many people are afraid to be tested because of the stigma ______ with HIV.

"What we are seeing in Iceland is that as the magma particles get towards the surface, they interact with the very cold water and they chill to form glassy ______ and these glassy ______ are small, they have sharp edges and when those get up in the air that is what is causing the risk to aviation."
At training camp, he and the 12 other African-Americans in his squadron of 200 were automatically ______ from the whites.
On the other hand, some ______ Russian unit of length might be involved.
result.chn: 在另一方面，一些模糊的俄罗斯长度单位可能涉及。()

result.problem: There would have been a ______ sense, and Milton has to have been sensitive to this, that it was simply too late to write an epic of any kind on any subject.
result.chn: 这很明显，弥尔顿肯定意识到了这一点，这个时候写史诗，不管写什么主题，都已经太晚了。(弥尔顿课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: The rights group says the government's foot-dragging on calls for justice for the victims of post-election violence threatens to undermine Kenya's stability and ______ future economic development.
The first one is ______ mode where you have to go from novice to professional.
result.chn: 第一个是你必须从新手去到专业人士的探索方式。()

result.problem: The statement doesn't say what McDonald's plans to do about CSPI's threatened lawsuit, and a spokeswoman wouldn't ______ in emails.
______ in the Islamic Saudi Academy, one of the school's best students is now in jail for having tried to kill President Bush."
bugs That is a problem that may not ______.
result.chn: 随机的在代码中去搜寻。(计算机科学及编程导论课程节选 : 麻省理工公开课)

result.problem: It and reversing current different is not to be, but with a anode ______ stop, because the intermittent power supply current interrupted, cathode potential with time periodically change.
result.chn: 它与换向电流所不同的是不把镀件作阳极，而是间歇地停止供电，由于间歇中断电流，阴极电位随时间周期性地变化。()

result.problem: So it turns out that the very first one, voters are not evenly distributed is certainly true, it's ______ true.
result.chn: 首相想到的就是,现实中选民是不均匀分布的,这的确是毋庸置疑的(博弈论课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: but there's also that huge, I think ______.
result.chn: 占很大一部分，我认为贫富差距很大。(SpeakingMax英语口语达人 : 生活费偏高)

result.problem: And this was ______ work. What you have here is the photographic plate demonstrating a spread.
result.chn: 这是门,细致的工作。(固态化学导论课程节选 : 麻省理工公开课)
